pr_title: ci: update docker-push.sh to manage the paths to workspace correctly

timeline.message:
ci: update docker-push.sh to manage the paths to workspace correctly

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: is the export needed here if we're not using it here any more?  wondering if we should export it in a parent shell script instead...
timeline.author: lmsurpre
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -11,7 +11,8 @@ docker login -u ${DOCKERHUB_USERNAME} -p ${DOCKERHUB_TOKEN}
 
 # Executes the build for the ibm-fhir-schematool
 # This build runs first so that the FAILURE comes before and stops the subsequent builds/releases.
-${WORKSPACE}/fhir-install/src/main/docker/ibm-fhir-schematool/build.sh
+export WORKSPACE=$(pwd)

replies.bodyText:
I opted to do it here, as I knew it worked relatively when I tested locally.
Normally I have it at the workflow level, it's an option here.
replies.author: prb112
